com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium

Class NetworkService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium.NetworkService

  • public class NetworkService
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to a network level functionality.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NetworkService(com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium.internal.ipc.IPC ipc, int browserContextId) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NetworkDelegate getNetworkDelegate()
      Returns NetworkDelegate associated with the current BrowserContext instance.
      ResourceHandler getResourceHandler()
      Returns registered resource handler or null if no resource handler is currently registered.
      void setNetworkDelegate(NetworkDelegate delegate)
      Configures the current Browser instance to use new HTTP request/response handler to process all HTTP requests/responses.
      void setResourceHandler(ResourceHandler handler)
      Sets resource handler that will be invoked every time to ask whether specified resource (HTML, image, JavaScript, CSS file, etc.) should be downloaded from a web server or not.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NetworkService

        public NetworkService(com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium.internal.ipc.IPC ipc,
                      int browserContextId)

    • Method Detail

      • setNetworkDelegate

        public void setNetworkDelegate(NetworkDelegate delegate)
        Configures the current Browser instance to use new HTTP request/response handler to process all HTTP requests/responses. The NetworkDelegate can be used for intercepting HTTP request/response headers and modifying them on the fly.

        To reset NetworkDelegate and enable default behavior, pass null to this method.

        Parameters:
        delegate - the new NetworkDelegate handler.

      • getNetworkDelegate

        public NetworkDelegate getNetworkDelegate()
        Returns NetworkDelegate associated with the current BrowserContext instance. By default this method returns null.
        Returns:
        the NetworkDelegate associated with this Browser instance or null if there's no registered NetworkDelegate.

      • setResourceHandler

        public void setResourceHandler(ResourceHandler handler)
        Sets resource handler that will be invoked every time to ask whether specified resource (HTML, image, JavaScript, CSS file, etc.) should be downloaded from a web server or not.
        Parameters:
        handler - a new resource handler. Can be null.

      • getResourceHandler

        public ResourceHandler getResourceHandler()
        Returns registered resource handler or null if no resource handler is currently registered. By default this method returns null, so all resources will be downloaded from a web server as well.
        Returns:
        the registered resource handler or null if no resource handler is currently registered.
